'Decyl glucoside' is a mild non-ionic surfactant used in cosmetic formularies
including baby shampoo and in products for individuals with a sensitive skin.
Many natural personal care companies use this cleanser because it is plant-
derived, biodegradable, and gentle for all hair types.
